entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 9 April 2023
